name: Dungeon Worm (Anime)
text:
When this card destroys a monster by battle: it gains 100 ATK.
During either player's Main Phase(Quick Effect): You can make this card gain/lose this effect:
? Cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly. Cannot attack.
Once per turn, During either player's Battle Phase(Quick Effect): You can make this card gain/lose this effect:
? Cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly. Cannot attack.
